|buttons = Reset |led = Power, Eth1, Eth2, Wifi1, Wifi2 |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Senao PCE4551AH <!-- (-ETS) --> |rad1modif = Mini PCIe |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9890;QCA9890-BR4A; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1300 |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Senao PCE3300AN |rad2modif = Mini PCIe |rad2chip1 = Atheros;AR9590;AR9590-AR1A; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *Dual Radio 802.11ac 3x3:3 MIMO (int. ant. 2 EN)
{{See also|Extreme Networks|Enterasys|Aerohive}}
*If FCC ID ''{{FCC.io|QXO-AP3825E}}'' is related this device, it is likely using :[[QCA]] QCA9890 (QCA9890-BR4A) for its 802.11ac radio <!-- :The SoC used may be [[QCA]] QCA9558/QCA9550 --> :The module shown in this filing is from ''[[Senao]]'': :• [[Senao PCE3300AN]] (AH) • [[Senao PCE4551AH]] (-ETS)
===Models=== *[[Extreme Networks AP3825i]] (WS-AP3825i) - integral antennas <!-- B00JUY4UYE;UK; --> *[[Extreme Networks AP3825e]] (WS-AP3825e) - external antennas <!-- B00N5599PO;UK; --> :FCC ID: QXO-AP3825E (2014-03-27) • ''Extreme Networks''
Sticker on the back of device at Ethernet ports states: ''Model: WS-AP3825i, AP ID: WS-AP3825i-1, Contains FCCID: QXO-AP3715I, QXO-AP3825E, Contains IC: 4138A-AP3715I, 4141B-AP3825E''
==Links of Interest== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/t/adding-openwrt-support-for-ws-ap3825i/101168 ''Adding OpenWrt support for WS-AP3825i'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] *[https://openwrt.org/toh/extreme_networks/ws-ap3825i On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] *[https://datasheet.octopart.com/AR8035-AL1B-Qualcomm-datasheet-13029019.pdf ''AR8035-AL1B Datasheet''] *[https://www.datasheets360.com/pdf/3468516903475398480 ''ProMOS V73CAG01(808/168)RB Datasheet''] *[https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/dst/5v41186-datasheet ''Renesas IDT5V41186 Datasheet''] *[https://www.ti.com/lit/ds/symlink/sn74lv164a.pdf ''TI SN74LV164A Datasheet''] *[https://www.mouser.com/datasheet/2/149/74lvt373-288524.pdf ''Fairchild 74LVT373 Datasheet''] *[https://ww1.microchip.com/downloads/en/DeviceDoc/00001783C.pdf ''Microchip USB3300 Datasheet''] *[https://www.nxp.com/products/processors-and-microcontrollers/power-architecture/qoriq-communication-processors/p-series/qoriq-p1020-and-p1011-dual-and-single-core-communications-processors:P1020 ''NXP P1020 Processor Documentation''] *[https://www.ti.com/lit/ds/slvs885i/slvs885i.pdf ''TI TPS23754 PoE Controller''] *[https://www.nxp.com/part/P1020NSE2HFB#/ ''NXP P1020NSE2HFB Product Page'']
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/extreme_networks/extreme_networks_ws-ap3825i |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/extreme_networks/ws-ap3825i |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/t/adding-openwrt-support-for-ws-ap3825i |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = mpc85xx |subtarget = p1020 |arch = powerpc_8540 |support_started_version = 22.03.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.0 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
==Notes== * 4x Philips Screws, one under each rubber foot. Rubber feet have a strong adhesive and need a pry tool or slotted screwdriver to remove.
==See also== :;[[Extreme Networks]] • [https://www.extremenetworks.com/products/extremewireless/?group=214 Wi-Fi 6 AP] *[[Extreme Networks AP5050D]] - Wi-Fi 6E Cloud-managed Access Point :4x4:4 radio, OFDMA, outdoor, w/ int. 30/70deg directional antennas *[[Extreme Networks AP5050U]] - Wi-Fi 6E Cloud-managed Access Point :4x4:4 radio, OFDMA, outdoor, IP67-rated, w/ omni-directional antennas *[[Extreme Networks AP5010]] - Wi-Fi 6E Tri-Radio 4x4:4 Indoor Access Point :4x4:4 radio,indoor, with support for multiple operating systems *[[Extreme Networks AP4000]] - Wi-Fi 6E Tri-Radio 2x2:2 Indoor Access Point :2x2:2 radio, indoor, 2.4/5/6GHz, 3.9Gbps, dual-band threat sensor *[[Extreme Networks AP302W]] - Wi-Fi 6 Dual-Radio 2x2:2 Access Point :2x2:2 radio, indoor wallplate, wall and desk mount, enterprise-grade *[[Extreme Networks AP360i]] (e) - Wi-Fi 6 Dual-Radio Outdoor Access Point :2x2:2 radio, outdoor, dual 2x2 software programable radio
*[[Aerohive AP370]] • [[Aerohive AP390]] • [[Aerohive AP630]] *[[Aerohive AP650]] • [[Aerohive AP650X]] • [[Aerohive]] *[[Enterasys WS-AP3660]] • [[Enterasys WS-AP3705i]] *[[Enterasys WS-AP3715i]] • [[Enterasys WS-AP3715e]] *[[Enterasys WS-AP3715i Wireless Module]] - 802.11abgn Module :FCC ID: QXO-AP3715I (2013-05-24) • ''[[Enterasys]] Networks'' :QXO-AP3715E (2013-05-24), QXO-AP3715E1 (2014-02-04)
